org.cryptacular.bean

Class SaltedHashBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cryptacular.bean.EncodingHashBean
      • org.cryptacular.bean.SaltedHashBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HashBean<String>

    public class SaltedHashBean
extends EncodingHashBean
    Computes a salted hash from a random salt source.
    Author:
    Marvin S. Addison

      • compare

        public boolean compare(byte[] input,
              String hash)
        Compares the hash of the input against a known hash output.
        Specified by:
        compare in interface HashBean<String>
        Overrides:
        compare in class EncodingHashBean
        Parameters:
        input - Data to hash.
        hash - Known hash against which to compare.
        Returns:
        True if hash of input under digest is equal to given hash, false otherwise.
